commit message: Initialize H-Index to 0, effectively suppressing the notification on initial sync
Fix crash in GeekListItemFragment due to applying a palette before the UI has finished loading
Game description in API is no longer a required field
Collection item ranks in API is no longer a required field
Correct upgrading the database from pre-4.1
Correctly construct collection default where clause if no statuses are synced
Add debug logging to syncing buddies
Add debug logging to persisting plays
Correct the stat bar display when min isn't zero. (Previously the bar didn't represent the actual value accurately.)
Change the thresholds of weight descriptions to be evenly distributed over the range.
Prevent a NPE when cancelling a sync before it starts the first task.
Change how the log play date click is wired up. Hopefully this will fix the problem where it does nothing for some people.
Capture more data during SyncGames to figure out where int='' is coming from.
Update version name and code, put version number into change log and release notes
